DOC.brief_summary: This trial assess safety efficacy single dose lumiracoxib 400 mg compare placebo single dose celecoxib 200mg . It also assess safety efficacy 400mg lumiracoxib administer day 7 day compare placebo 200 mg celecoxib twice daily .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Osteoarthritis knee Pain intensity baseline least 50mm 100mm visual analog scale Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply
